meanings.definition: The quality or state of being narrow-minded or lacking intelligence.
meanings.sent1: Her pinheadedness prevented her from considering any other viewpoints.
meanings.sent2: His pinheadedness was evident in his refusal to listen to new ideas.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pinheadedness, he managed to make us laugh with his silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: The team's decision was marred by the pinheadedness of their leader.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her pinheadedness were clear when she missed out on important opportunities.

meanings.definition: A person who is narrow-minded or lacking intelligence.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a pinheadedness and consider all perspectives before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: The pinheadedness refused to acknowledge the facts presented to him.
meanings.sent3: The pinheadedness at the meeting kept insisting on his outdated ideas.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as a pinheadedness, unable to see beyond his own beliefs.
meanings.sent5: His reputation for pinheadedness preceded him wherever he went.
